version_description:
We’re on a mission to bring you the world’s most entertaining crossword puzzle 365 days a year.

Every update includes improvements for speed and reliability. When we release new features we will always let you know about them in the app. Thanks for spreading the word about Crosswords With Friends. We love our solvers!

We’re on a mission to bring you the world’s most entertaining crossword puzzle 365 days a year.

Every update includes improvements for speed and reliability. When we release new features we will always let you know about them in the app. Thanks for spreading the word about Crosswords With Friends. We love our solvers!

Crosswords With Friends is now live worldwide!

We’re on a mission to bring you the world’s most entertaining crossword puzzle 365 days a year. Thanks for spreading the word about Crosswords With Friends! We LOVE our solvers!

•Now you can see your friends from other With Friends games on your leaderboard! Continue the fun game to game!
•We’ve made some bug fixes to improve your experience!
•Added “tutorial skip” option per player feedback.
•We have improved the visuals for iPhone 6/6+/iPad Pro players!
•If you are a player of Daily Celebrity Crosswords, we will be starting to allow players to migrate their progress to Crosswords with Friends! You can keep your completed puzzles, stars and coins! Stay tuned for more updates.

We’re on a mission to bring you the world’s most entertaining crossword puzzle 365 days a year. Thanks for spreading the word about Crosswords With Friends! We LOVE our solvers!

We’ve fixed some bugs and made performance improvements.

Happy solving!

We’re on a mission to bring you the world’s most entertaining crossword puzzle 365 days a year. Thanks for spreading the word about Crosswords With Friends! We LOVE our solvers!
This release includes bug fixes to improve your experience.

Weekly Challenges are here! Earn rewards and special badges for completing puzzle challenges every week. Your daily puzzle solve streak will appear on the leaderboard along with the day of the week you had the fastest solve time. Earn achievements the higher your streak! Happy Solving!

We’re on a mission to bring you the world’s most entertaining crossword puzzle 365 days a year. Thanks for spreading the word about Crosswords With Friends!

Play puzzles in an all new way - pick a theme and play our catalog of thousands of puzzles. It’s the only way to get special badges for your profile.
Play up your profile! Create a unique user name and customize your profile pic. No nudes!
We’re on a mission to bring you the world’s most entertaining crossword puzzle 365 days a year. Thanks for spreading the word about Crosswords With Friends!

The Great Candy Cane Chase is upon us! During the event, players can earn Candy Canes by solving puzzles including special holiday puzzles that will be available for a limited time. Collect enough Candy Canes to earn a limited edition Holiday 2017 badge!
We’re on a mission to bring you the world’s most entertaining crossword puzzle 365 days a year. Thanks for spreading the word about Crosswords With Friends!

- Improved support for iOS 11
- Rewards for watching ads and completing surveys
- Resolved issue where some players would crash dismissing their confirmation pop-up on Puzzle Packs
- Earn more coins by watching additional videos
We’re on a mission to bring you the world’s most entertaining crossword puzzle 365 days a year. Thanks for spreading the word about Crosswords With Friends!

- New Icon for Valentine's Day <3
- Added support for iPhone X
- Resolved issues with the leaderboard not populating with correct information
We’re on a mission to bring you the world’s most entertaining crossword puzzle 365 days a year. Thanks for spreading the word about Crosswords With Friends!

To celebrate International Women's day, we have teamed with Progressive to bring you the Women Who Wow event! Starting 3/8 and running until 3/29, Players can collect Gems by solving puzzles. Players will also be able to solve additional puzzles every day themed around amazing women around the world!
We’re on a mission to bring you the world’s most entertaining crossword puzzle 365 days a year. Thanks for spreading the word about Crosswords With Friends!

You can now give and receive FREE daily gifts like hints from your friends! Yes, FREE! Want to get more hints and need more friends? Now you can discover and add new friends directly into the game from any profile.

Crosswords is celebrating Springtime with our NEW Spring Flowers Collection Event! Solve long clues in puzzles to collect flowers and earn hints and an EXCLUSIVE badge! You'll also enjoy a FREE extra puzzle each day of the event!

Put on shades and walk away slowly from an explosion because it's Summer Blockbuster season! From 6/18 - 7/9 Play our Summer Blockbuster event and collect tickets by playing puzzles to earn the Summer Blockbuster badge! A FREE new puzzle will be released the first 12 days of the event.

3.8.3
- Various minor bug fixes and improvements to tournaments

3.8.4
- Added game state stability improvements to ensure game boards and player currencies are properly saved in the event of a crash or close

3.8.5
- Updated many of our back-end Ad Network SDKs which we believe should improve player experience when engaging with various features and games within Crosswords with Friends
